text:
Hi All.

Does anyone use HubSpot email to send out internal comms?
I’ve had a request to build out a monthly newsletter to go to staff.

I know HubSpot can send these out. I just wonder if HubSpot is the right platform for this.
I could use sendgrid as an alternative.

Thanks

Thanks Courtney!

I had a similar line of thinking and came to the same pros and cons. Ideally I would be searching for a solution that would not require a delay in updating contact’s value.  Though I will most likely explore this option more unless I can find a better alternative!

Do people do it - yes.

Is it the right platform for it? like any technical decision really depends what your needs are, and if you already have access to the email tools.

The employees can exist in a contact list. You can send emails to that contact list.

Whether you want to cleanly separate your employee data from your customer data, that may be a consideration.

I don't mean a delay updating the contacts value, but a short delay (5 minutes?) before sending the email to ensure the property has a value before the email goes out. You wouldn't want it to go out and the link to be broken. :slightly_smiling_face:
